attributes.action: End The Game, stop the suppression
attributes.additional_details: I have already submitted multiple petitions that have been shot down, and most everyone knows what this is about already.  More than anything, I would just like the government to stop the suppression that the government seems to feel obliged to show towards this effort.  Please at least give this petition a chance to gather signatures. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Game_(mind_game)
